channel.title: Conan on Reflections
channel.description: Recent content in Conan on Reflections

item.title: No matter what we say
item.description: If you weren’t in a hole the past few days, you would have heard about the iPad 2 launch. Here’s Conan’s take on it. I must say, the cover is a thing of engineering beauty. Kudos on that, Apple, and thanks for screwing over several thousands of your iPad 1 customers, who forked up 9.5 Billion in revenue in 9 months.
